title: 1 Bedroom in Collinwood Area
posting_body: House is off St Clair Ave near Collinwood High School.
One Bedroom Fresh paint, Updated Bedroom, Kitchen, and Bath.
Front Porch and Driveway Parking.
Rooms are very spacious.
No laundry on site, but apartment size washer and dryer are okay.
$525 Rent Deposit $525.
First Month, Last month, and Deposit required.
Must have at least 2 years or more on your Job and or proof of two years or more on your previous jobs.
Video Tour Link
https://youtu.be/cos1tKJRlpk
Tenants pay lights, gas, water and sewer bill.
If interested ONLY TEXT
show contact info
please send answers and questions in text and someone will respond to you soon.
What’s your Name?
When are you looking to move?
How many adults and children will be living in the unit?
What’s your monthly income?
How long have you been on your job?
Have you ever been evicted?
Do u have pets?
Have you ever been convicted of a relevant crime?
La casa esta cerca de St Clair Ave y de Collinwood High School.
Tenemos un cuarto grande, la pintura fresca, cocina actualizada y baño .
Hay porche y aparcamiento calzada.
El alquiler es 525 al mes y el deposito 525.
Primer Mes, Último mes, y Depósito requerido.
Debe tener al menos 2 años o más en su trabajo y / o prueba de dos
años o más en sus trabajos anteriores.
Prohibido Lavar Ropa, pero si tiene una lavadora y secadora del tamaño de un apartamento están bien.
Los inquilinos pagan luces, gas, Agua y alcantarillado.
Si está interesado SOLO
